articles.title: The 207 best October Prime Day deals
articles.description: Amazon’s October Prime Day sale (aka Prime Big Deal Days) is finally here, and we’ve collected the best deals we could find on everything from noise-canceling headphones and robot vacuums to 4K OLED TVs. The majority of our recommendations have been thoroughly tested by Verge writers and editors, and we are just as confident in our recommendations […]
articles.author: Brandt Ranj

articles.title: The best laptop deals you can get for Amazon’s October Prime Day
articles.description: The second Amazon Prime Day sales event of the year is here, and once again it offers discounts on MacBooks, Windows laptops, and various PC accessories. Like previous Prime Big Deal Days, this sale runs for two days and requires a Prime membership to qualify for most discounts. Some sale prices are open to anyone, […]
articles.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto

articles.title: You can score up to $750 off robovacs from iRobot, Dreame, and Eufy right now
articles.description: Black Friday might bring some of the deepest discounts on tech like robot vacuums, but if you’d like to tidy up before Halloween parties and Thanksgiving guests arrive, Amazon’s fall Prime Day event features plenty of great robot vacuum deals, including discounts on products like Roborock’s S8 MaxV Ultra and the budget-friendly Tapo RV30 Max […]
articles.author: Sheena Vasani

articles.title: The 26 best fall Prime Day deals on AirPods, iPads, and other Apple gear
articles.description: At long last, Amazon’s October Prime Day event has begun — and as expected, it’s packed with a slew of notable Apple deals. If you don’t want to wait until Black Friday to score a discount, the current promo is a great opportunity to save, as Amazon is offering steep discounts on a variety of […]
articles.author: Sheena Vasani

articles.title: The best October Prime Day deals on TVs, soundbars, and more — up to 50% off
articles.description: The day has finally come for a home theater overhaul. Perhaps you’re looking for a low-cost replacement that offers more features and a sharper design. Or maybe your gaze is set upon massive OLED TVs with all the fixings. Regardless, the Prime Big Deal Days sale is here, with deals from noteworthy TV makers including […]
articles.author: Brandt Ranj

articles.title: We dug through thousands of Prime Day deals to find 60 standouts for $50 or less
articles.description: Big-ticket tech like Sony’s Bravia 8 4K TV and Bose’s QuietComfort Headphones might be some of the more marquee deals we’re seeing during Prime Big Deal Days, but you don’t need to spend hundreds of dollars to score something great for yourself or someone else. If you’re working with a shoestring budget, or at least […]
articles.author: Sheena Vasani

articles.title: The electric screwdriver I use for DIY projects is 40 percent off right now
articles.description: If you have small devices that are on the fritz — or in need of a slight modification — Hoto’s Electric Precision Screwdriver ADV is great for DIY projects. Its size and power make it well suited for tinkering with phones, laptops, and handheld gaming consoles, with its pen-style grip, simple one-button operation, and tidy […]
articles.author: Brandon Russell
